mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOKENS(NAME, CONTENTS, TYPE, ENTITY_ID, CREATED, EXPIRES) VALUES (#{name}, #{contents}, #{type}, #{owner}, #{created}, #{expires})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TOKENS WHERE NAME = #{name} AND TYPE = #{type}
mapper.update: UPDATE TOKENS SET CONTENTS=#{contents}, EXPIRES=#{expires} WHERE NAME=#{name} AND TYPE=#{type}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOKENS WHERE NAME=#{name} AND TYPE = #{value}
SELECT * FROM TOKENS WHERE ENTITY_ID=#{owner} AND TYPE = #{value}
SELECT * FROM TOKENS WHERE EXPIRES < NOW()
